BackEnd

Class GameSave

  • java.lang.Object
    • BackEnd.GameSave

  • public class GameSave
extends java.lang.Object
    This class records each players decisions. We can then read this file and put it into gameLogic to load the game.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    David Langmaid, George Sanger

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameSave(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> initData)
      Constructs a GameSave that tracks all player choices for saving state of the game

      • playActionTile

        public void playActionTile(Coordinate location,
                           ActionTile tile,
                           int playerNo)
        Keeps note that a player has played a action card.
        Parameters:
        location - where the card was played (null if NA)
        tile - what tile was played
        playerNo - what player the tile was played on (unimportant if NA)

      • isGameSaved

        Checks if latest changes has been saved to file.
        Returns:
        true is every change is saved to file
